ygData.subject: Re: NO EXP
ygData.msgSnippet: hrmm.. well.. depends on your style of play. If you solo, or if you group. I would say that the suggestions of the others are good. I killed *thinks
ygData.messageBody:
hrmm.. well.. depends on your style of play. If
you solo, or if you group.<br><br>I would say that
the suggestions of the others are good. I killed
*thinks back hard* on Orc hill I believe. In the
Faydarks, someone I believe mentioned that bandit camps. I
agree. Those are some good exp and they have the
necklace quests too. The Nybright sisters are good but you
might need some help.<br><br>I didn't move into CB
until 10 to 12 I believe. Then I went to Derv camps in
North Ro. <br><br>If you're looking to solo, probably
beetles in Butcherblock are the way to go. They're
generally easy enough to isolate and aren't as tough as
basilisks. 8 might be a little low for a Wizzie to do
beetles though. Good for melees or better yet-- groups.
Had a bard friend that loved them.<br><br>Fatehue
Prismatic, of the Drinal Server.<br>Tribunal of the
Antiquities-- growing<br>stronger every day. =)
